content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to my cousins house and i was driving through the village next to where i live. as i was driving i just happened to look up and noticed several orange glowing balls in the sky. there was ten to fifteen of them roughly. i decided that knowing i had my camera on me i would stop in a good clear place and take the photo. i stopped where there was no trees. the sky was very clear so these balls were shinning bright. i took the photo watched them for about a minute and noticed that they were still and there was no noise. one or two of them appeared to move up and down slightly but mainly they were still. i got back into my car and started to drive. i kept looking back at them and after about minute and half they had disappeared, before the end of the road. when i got to my cousin house i took a look at my photo and i was expecting to see the orange balls that i saw, instead i saw what appeared to be metal disc like shapes all of them being the same shape with a little point on the top. when you zoom in and brighten the picture a little they look good. have no idea what they are, but i think they look like death gliders out of stargate.
content.summary: Orange balls in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
September 2, 2008
12:20 am

ufo sighting

hwy 151 and main st. exit 101, sun prairie, wi

my boyfriend and i were heading back home to sun prairie, wi from labor day weekend in the north woods.  we had a couple of friends car pooling with us so we dropped them off in downtown madison first and then headed north/northeast towards home.

we usually take east washington out of the city, which turns into hwy 151, and takes us all the way home.  sun prairie is a fairly populated and growing suburb on the outskirts of madison.  although it also has several beautiful farm lands, lots of open country and wild animals, it���s only about a 20-25 minute drive from the city.  it���s far enough though to get out of the hustle and bustle of downtown life.  we���re just not city folk so we love the country feel that sun prairie gives us.

so we were heading ne on hwy 151, traveling the speed limit of 65, and we were about ��� a mile from our exit 101 ��� main st. when i spotted something and pointed it out to my boyfriend.  i began slowing down, and almost completely stopped because there was no traffic behind us, and we were both watching in amazement while going down the list of possibilities���shooting star, no, comet, no, f-16, no.  it seemed at first to be heading east then slightly se then quickly changed to a ne direction.  it was only about 450-500 feet in front of us and about 500 feet up in the air and descending before it faced ne and completely disappeared.

i first thought it was a comet because it had a tail of fire behind it and that idea quickly went out the window.  then i thought it was a f-16 because the tail looked like an after burner although the color was orange/red, yellow and white and there were no shock diamonds so it was totally inconsistent with a true after burner, besides the fact that it was descending and there was no roaring noise that would of surely shook my truck and our ear drums. 

i could see no ship, no lights, and not even an outline of a ship, even with the street lights and town lights on.  it seemed to be floating down slowly in front of us with fluid like motions as almost a jet ski would glide on glassy waters.  when it did turn ne, we were looking at the rear of the ship and i could almost make out a ring, similar to a single engine military craft, against a black background, before the burner went out and completely disappeared into the night.

the capabilities, maneuvers, and behavior of this craft are like none that the us military has made public or that i have ever seen before.  i contacted the local police department to find out if there were any reports of strange sightings in the area, but there were none.  i also phoned the local madison regional airport, where i know they do have f-16���s, and got a hold of operations where i was told the only landings and take offs were at 9:30 pm and 11:52 pm on sept.1st and 1:30 am on sept.2nd, none of which were f-16���s.  the only planes reported to leave the ground or land were a crj (jet) and a learjet.

we were so captivated by what we were witnessing that we didn���t even snap a photo.  i am working on simulating the event in an animated movie and will post it when i���m done.

this is not my first time experiencing mysterious lights and air craft in the skies and i do have some pictures of previous events in florida and colorado that i will also be posting on this site.  honestly i have always been a little weary about sharing my photos and findings, for obvious reasons, but now that i have found mufon and have observed the good work they���re doing, i feel relieved, comfortable, and excited, and want to share mufon with all my friends and family!

ps- i���ve attached a map of exactly where it happened and as i said above, i will be uploading an animated version of the event when i���m done.
content.summary: Black ship with orange/red, yellow, and white tail shooting from the back

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking up in the evening sky, when i saw a faint looking star moving southward.  i thought it could be a satellite, as i was watching this move, a flash came from the southeastern direction.  it was a quick white flash as if someone was trying to say, "hey i'm over here".  my sister happens to be looking up at the time as well, and makes a comment "was that a falling star or what"?  i said "you saw that too".  i was relieved to know this was not my imagination.  i said "no", i was watching that other star looking object, which was just north west of this flash, when this flash turned on and slowly turned off.  it was not like a falling star at all, it was if someone turned on a bright white light, then slowly it turned off.  

about three mins later, i happen to look up, and as i did, i noticed object fly just above me heading north; it appeared to have a wispy orange glow that seemed to have two bright lights at the front of it, almost shaped like a triangle with rounded edges.  i mentioned it to my sister who was sitting next to me.  i thought did i just imagine it, or was i just really tired.

i was curious to know what this might have been, so i grabbed my binoculars nikon 10x50, i aimed towards the area where i saw the flash originally, as i was searching the skies, this object flew within my view, and it was huge.  it seemed to have two sets of lights in a row in what seemed to appear as a "v" shaped object.

xx     xx
 xx   xx
  xx xx
   xx

not sure exactly how many lights were at on the object itself, however, i do know for sure it had two sets of lights in each row which outlined this object.  i watched it as it flew almost gliding throughout the sky heading northeast.  i was telling my sister to look up where i was pointing, i did not want to loose sight of this object within the binoculars view, and she said she saw nothing.  

i am assuming this object must have been up pretty high for my sister not to see it, however, when i saw it looking through the binoculars it appeared to be large.  i would say it was twice the size of a jetliner.  

the best way i can describe this object is by comparison.  
example:  looking up approx. 1000ft at a 747 jetliner, through my 10x50 binoculars, the plane would appear to be the size of a nickel, and the bottom of the airliner would be difficult to see clearly as it is dark, and generally there are no lights at the bottom of the craft, perhaps a blue and red light at the wings and a white/yellowish light at the front of the plane.
now looking a this "v" shaped object it seemed like the lights were a whitish color, yet not blinding, and the object looked to be the size of a 50cent piece, quite large.  i could not tell you what altitude this object was at, as it could not been seen with the naked eye.  

note: during this 15 minutes duration, my sister and i noticed the dogs next door were barking like crazy.  we thought "those dogs are sure non-stop tonight".  it was getting annoying listening to those dogs.  

while viewing this object through my binoculars, my sister made a comment about the dogs, she said "did you notice the dogs stopped barking".  i listened and realized yeah, they did stop.  while looking at this object i couldn't believe what i was seeing.  i just kept saying to myself "what is it".  perhaps, it was lingering around the area above the skies unnoticeable, and then decided to leave.  i must say, the dogs were quiet after this thing departed.  

i wanted to know if anyone else had seen this object in the skies:
lax area, beach cities (sobay), torrance, lawndale.
september 1, 2008  approx: 9:51 - 10:15pm ish.
content.summary: While looking through my binoculars, something came across my view - it was large with lots of lights

content.detailedDescription: We live in a large housing complex,i live in the rear of my building close to some very dense woods,maybe 10yrds.From my patio.Around 11:15pm. aug.25th.Of 2007,i was sitting with my lady friend on her patio about two doors from mine,my back was to my patio,and she was facing my patio,we were talking and all of a sudden her face changed,her mouth fell open,her eyes got big and i immediately said,"what?What? and turned to see about 10 to a dozen of huge round lights on an oval object hovering just above the trees near my patio.We jumped up,i grab her hand and told her,"c'mon,it's a ufo" we made it to my patio in about 3 seconds flat.We were almost directly under this thing when it seemed to see us & ever so gently turned away from us & glided away.I was looking so hard at this object to see a top,a bottom,sides,something,but there was nothing,and absolutely no noise at all!Also, the lights were in the front & halfway around the sides,so when it turned we no longer could see it. we were so close that i could've hit it with a rock.After it left we just stood there looking at a dark sky,we went back to her patio to sit down and i was mad at myself for running after it,because i wondered if we didn't,what was it going to do.There was no logical reason why it would be hovering between two trees as if it were watching us.
content.summary: Sitting outside on our patio,myself & a friend saw a ufo hovering just above the trees.

content.detailedDescription: On this day in january, it was very clear and cloudless. i worked at a correctional facility (prison) in canon city, colorado. at approximately 1515, i was taking my crew of inmates back to the shop to turn in our tools and prepare the gang to be searched and put back into the general population of the prison. myself and an inmate who i remember as (dog)williams, (his gang name). we were discussing something about what we were going to do the next day. i then (for whatever reason) looked up into the bright afternoon sky, very clear...No clouds very bright afternoon. i then saw at about 11 oclock from the zenith almost straight up and out at a distance of 7 miles to the north of my location, a very large sphere, chrome in color with three brown spots on the side facing me. this sphere was absolutely huge and very high, i estimated the heightth to be 50 to 60 thousand feet. it was much higher than a jet would fly. on certain clear days one can almost see windows on a jet airliner and can sometimes identify what a jet type is 727. or737 or dc-10. this was one of those clear days... the sphere was large enough that at least ten airliners could have fit across the face of the side that i was observing. the sphere was hovering for about 1 minute and then, noiselessly, and very quicky accelerated over the horizon in about 1 to 2 seconds. one of the interesting facts was that the craft was some ten miles west of norad (north american air defense command) located in cheyenne mountain colorado. it was very like the craft that picked up the starman in the movie starman with jeff bridges. the inmate and i just looked at each other and said what in the hell was that? to this day i have no idea what it was...
content.summary: Very large chrome sphere

content.detailedDescription: Disc 30 to 35 ft diameter 200 yds away 80 to 100 feet off ground dark reflective surfice passed over highway and my car sunnyday many must have seen it photo clear and sharp best i have ever seen and is genuine
content.summary: Observed  craft while driving east on rt 90 near austerlitz ny took photo

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north on marks rd. about 3 miles north of route 303. the visible sun had dropped near the horizon and was obscured by cirrus clouds. purple cirrus clouds were illuminated in the western sky. i looked northwest over a farm field and saw a stack of lights, six or seven stacked up vertically. it was more like 2 at the bottom horizontally aligned, then three above that row, horizontally aligned, then three more on the next horizontal plane. it looked like a chandelier. i only saw it for a few seconds. i went through some trees, which blocked the view. as i emerged from the trees to the next open area, the lights were gone. at the time, i perceived that these were several crafts in formation. but as i think back, it could have been one large craft with an array of light sources.

there was no visible movement. but i only saw it for about 3 seconds.
content.summary: Stack of lights over west of marks rd. north of rt 303

content.detailedDescription: I was outside of the catholic church (coming from a funeral) driving down the back road on live oak and one of my siblings pointed out a white cigar shaped ufo to the north of us.  they didn't know what it was and thought it was a parachute or hang glider.  however it was way too large for either of these to be true.  my guess is it was about 10-15 miles away, and it was much larger than the military helicopter that happened to be in the air, it was closer, and coming towards us from where the craft was. it was also heading over the mountain east of the city so if it were a hang glider or parachute as my siblings thought, as it would not have been going towards the mountain.  it was very low and just barely above the mountain.  i kept an eye on it and after a couple minutes of not looking it was gone.
content.summary: White cigar shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my yard in manor, pa looking at the clouds in the evening of i believe august 23, 2008, somewhere around 7 pm (it could have been a little earlier or later, but quite a bit before sunset). i was observing clouds and contrails from the jets in the sky, looking toward the east.  i noticed a silver cylinder type object moving along under the level of the sparse clouds in the upper eastern sky.  it was moving at a reasonable speed that i would expect a jet to fly, going from approximately south to north-northeast. the length of the object would be about the width of the tip of my little finger when held at arms length to the sky (about a 1/2 inch or so), and it's heigth was about a little less than half of it's length - rectangular like - with i believe blunt, not tapered, ends.  i thought it should be an airplane or jet but i kept looking at it and could not notice any wings at all protruding from it.  it did not leave any contrail which isn't unusual.  but as i kept looking at it, i felt that it wasn't flying extremely high so i should have been able to see some shape of wings.  i recalled seeing jets that looked even smaller and higher in the sky and i was able to make out their form, but on this i could only see a cylinder shape.  it appeared to be a silver cylinder and was reflecting the light of the sun (which was behind me and low in the sky) with no apparant lights of its own.  i thought that if a jet were banking or something that maybe i wouldn't see the wings, but it was flying a straight line across the sky. it crossed my mind that maybe it could be a blimp type object but i don't have any comparison to make because i never saw a blimp flying that high in the sky and looking solid silver.  i didn't see any sign of windows, or lights but at that distance, i might not have been able to see them even if there were some.  i watched it until i could no longer see it because of my house and trees.  i look at the sky a lot in the day and night, observing clouds and stars.  i have never seen this type of object and if there is a good explanation for this, i'd like to hear it.  i mentioned it to my husband who wasn't really interested, and when i read the sunday paper article about ufo's being tracted from a local neighborhood (jeannette), i thought i'd report what i saw and maybe get an explanation. 
i was so fascinated with watching it, i didn't think to get a picture, which i truly regret.
content.summary: A shiny silver cylinder object moving south to north approx.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside watering my trees, walking back inside my house i noticed in the southeastern sky what looked like a floating black circle object. the sphere had a bright white light in the center and red light spinning around. stopping to watch, i noticed it moved closer making no sound and moved slowly to the northeast. the object seemed to move back and forth. i watched it till i could no longer see it to the east. i have no idea what this could have been; i even called my girlfriend and son out to see it and they were not sure either.
content.summary: Black circle with bright white light in center and red light spinning around.

content.detailedDescription: About 11:00 pm eastern standard time, i was out side looking at the clear sky . in the northeast at about 35 degrees above the horizon i saw a circle of lights  that were red green and sometimes white blinking in what seemed to be a random pattern. they stayed in a tight globe , for a while but at some point changed to an oval and cigar. i watched it for at least 40,minutes. in that time it did not move at all.I looked at it with binoculars in focus. i left that setting and the next morning looked into the sky to see what object would be in focus. the were some light cirus clouds at about the same inclination. thats where the focus was the most clear. so how far away it was i don't know. 10, 20 miles? all the time it did not move. when i went to bed it was still there.
content.summary: Lights in the sky (unmoving)

content.detailedDescription:
I was reading a report from back in february of 2008 from the campbellsville area in taylor county, and it reminded me of something that happened back in february of 2006.  my wife doesn't really care to discuss stuff like this much, even though we've both seen our share of weird stuff, but she came home one night and told me about a light she saw on the way home from work.  

we live out on 70 between campbellsville and liberty, and the taylor county line is about halfway to campbellsville.  she works overnights there, and drives home in the early hours of the morning.  the following is what i entered in my journal at that time:

"a couple of nights ago, my wife saw a light following along side her as she drove home from the night shift at work. she described it as a white ball of light. i asked her if maybe it was the moon through the trees, and she said no, that the moon was on the other side. i asked her how large it was, and she said that it was hard to tell because she couldn't be sure of the distance, but it looked to be about as big as a beach ball."

i remember her telling me that it seemed to stay alongside her.  also, i entered this into my journal about my neighbor's sighting a few days after hers:

"i told my buddy about it, who has seen far stranger things along with me, and he reacted by asking if she was hallucinating. i thought it was a little unnecessary. 

then last night, he comes running over when i get off work, and tells me that he forget to tell me what happened thursday night on his way home from his in-laws. 

he saw a white strobing type light in the sky, and at first thought it might be some sort of tower beacon, even though he'd never seen one there before. but the light kept moving as he'd get closer, and change position. then it eventually just left. i told him that it wouldn't surprise me, as the place he saw it is only a few miles from the famous ufo sighting near liberty, ky in the mid 70's. 

i restrained myself from asking if he'd hallucinated it."
content.summary: Ball of light, approximately beach ball size.

content.detailedDescription:
On aug. 30th at about 2230 hours i was laying on my couch. i glanced out the window at the stars.I saw a light blinking in the sky. i thought it was a star, but it blinked too rapidly.I thought maybe it was satellite maybe.I got my binoculars and looked at it. that's when i saw the lights in a horizontal line. there were 5 of them: two elongated square shaped lights on each side of a brighter center light.Sometimes above the center light a green light flashed very rapidly, then it would change to orange.The white light always brilliant.At first i thought it must be a plane with its landing lights on, but it never changed direction or altitude. the lights remained stationary for most of the time. i could hear no noise associated with the lights. i saw the same lights on aug. 31 at about 2400 hours.They were in almost the same area of sky - north east of lakeport and about 20 to 30 degrees above the horizon.They only remained for about an hour. on sept.1st i saw them again at about 2245 hours, slightly more to the east than the previous two nights, but the same distance above the horizon.Again they stayed for about an hour.However, this time at one point there was another set of lights above the first set; they appeared to be slightly smaller, but had the same configuration and colors.They were very close to the larger set, almost as if they were sitting on the larger set.They only stayed about 2 minutes, then were gone. they were there then gone. i could not discern a shape; i could only see the lights. i reported this info to an friend of mine who is an astronomer and he plans to try and observe the lights tonight. he should get a better view because he has telescopes available to him. 
when the object left, it just seemed to disappear.One minute it was there and the next it was gone.
content.summary: I saw a horizontal row of 5 lights. the center one was very bright and flashed at time. there were two lights on each side of the center light which were dimmer and shaped like an elongated square. it remained stationary for the 2 hours.

content.detailedDescription:
i live in the country about 2 miles from town.  i can and do hear truck and car noises from the highway.  i am in the flight path of the rescue helicopters that land in our hospital and go to the airport to fuel.  i have lived in this area for 5 years at this location.  grew up within a few miles and lived out in the country during the late 80's and 90's, where i also have had a strange unexplained sighting. let me say that i have also hunted and been around all kinds of animals and machinery. 
                   the wind was blowing all day and into evening. a storm was in the area.  i had shut the windows except for my bedroom window on the west was open a couple inches. my window above my head on the south was open all the way.  i had gone to bed early and was sleeping soundly.
i was awakened suddenly out of sleep by a loud strange worbling noise.
this noise was like nothing i had ever heard before.  i did not see anything to be quite honest i did not want to look out of the window. this noise went on for at least 15 minutes because i remember looking at the clock.  the impression that i got from the noise was that it was moving in a grid like pattern north to south then east to west.  as if looing for something. this was the impression that i had. the noise got louder and softer as it moved.  as i said i have heard a variety of things and this is like nothing i have ever heard.  i lay in bed thinking
of any possible thing that it could be. this was a worbling whistling noise. i didn't have a tape recorder in the house.
     this continued back and forth very close, seemed to be right over the back yard and a little to the south until it came from the west and moved east until it abruptly stopped when it got very close. i would estimate withing 50 yards or less.  i never heard it again.  i wanted to look out the window but really was very uneasy of what i might see. i felt very uneasy.  i layed awake for quite a while until i fell asleep and did not feel uneasy when i woke this morning.

   we have a grove of trees behind our house and ever since we moved here i have not felt comfortable going in the north side of it.  my son who is grown feels the same way.
    a few weeks ago i was sleeping and was awakened in much the same way by a noise that i have not heard before.  it was coming from the north edge of the trees this time.  it was a call that sounded like some other kind of animal but again nothing that we have in this state.  we have had foxes out there and they sound really strange but this was no fox.
    both times the dogs didn't seem to notice which i find strange.
the call from the trees went on for several minutes and made me very uneasy.
content.summary: Awakened from a sound sleep having heard a very strange noise

content.detailedDescription:
Witnessed a black disc hovering in the clear, blue sky while driving home. after arriving home, wife and sister-in-law also reported seeing same black disc, but the saw it move at high speed, make right angle turns, and stop on a dime. went outside to look for it again but it was gone.

location: new design road, frederick, md 21703

this not the first time i have seen objects similar to this one in this exact same area, but it was the first time during daylight hours.
content.summary: Black disc

content.detailedDescription: In august of 04 i was at work and had gone out for a break, when something in the east caught my eye. at first i thought they were geese flying in a v formation, and then realised that geese don't fly at 3000 feet and at 500 miles per hour (approx). they were about 5 to 8 miles away and heading south, about where shreiver air base is at.About that time , two of my co workers came out, and i pointed out what i was looking at. they also seen it. the objects were playing it looked like, because at first they were in the v formation, then the two in the rear would separate and fly up front while the two up front would separate and go back where the two had been. then the second to the rear ones would go up front, while the front ones would go to the rear. then they would all break formation and would fly in a group of a rough circle, flying erratically. all at once in a instant as one all together, they tilted at a 45 degree angle very fast as if they had dodged something, then immidiately straightened back out as a group. as they did this the sunlight glanced off of them, showing them to be metallic craft of some kind, and were in the shape of something between a diamond and a disk.The tall trees out side then got in the way, so i ran around the building to see if i could spot them as they went southward, but the trees were also in the way in the front of the building, so i lost them. i then went back to where my two friends were still at, and was discussing the strange event, when i looked up where the objects had been earlier, there was a plane flying in the very same spot and in the very same direction as the earlier objects had been. it was not a jet or a passenger plane,but looked like a military plane. now that led me to believe that someone knew about this event as well.Two years later my sister sent me a dvd that she had transfered from my dads old movie films onto disk of our childhood in montana, and 15 minuets into the footage, lo and behold their they were again! only this footage was taken in the late 1960's or early 70's. the same exact thing flying at about 2,000 or 3,000 feet.And doing the same thing as what i witnessed in 2004 , only this time in montana!I believe if the footage now on disk were enhanced with computer technology, it would show very clearly, and up close what i also witnessed in 2004.It was unusual enough, that my dad filmed them for approx 30 seconds or so. i'm not sure how to download the dvd clip for you, otherwise i would.(sorry) i'm only in colorado springs, which isn't far from you in ft, collins. maybe you can have someone call me or stop by and i will be happy to play it for themm and see what they think.  thank you. sincerely; matt
content.summary: 18 metalic ufos playing

content.detailedDescription:
Hey its me again. well anyways that guy who recently sent those photos from sublette, il, that thing has been hovering near our house every single night i for i dont know how many months. it is the same beautiful aqua blue and if you stare you can mildly see the red lights blinking on it. i wonder who is on it and i play it cool, i dont even take pictures although we have a digital camera and i could, i dont see the point i'm so used to seeing it hovering there. it doesnt leave it slowly drifts over many hours and everynight i take my last glance after a cigarette and walk back inside falling back asleep without a problem. maybe im a nerd but i dont know wether to feel blessed to cursed but somehow i know it is there because of me. i even have been writing a new bible with the rules of eternal life enjoying the feeling of being a king solomon god-like figure, like im preparing for resurrection or abduction because i have something to offer. my life is sad. but yeah check out that sublette, illinois post, one of those things is blinking in the east skies of downtown st charles. that is the most i got going in my life so i figure id share with mufon and the people in hopes we can move on with life and they will share theyre secrets with us. we all are suffering.
i didnt take that pic that other guy did but that thing dont budge or play swing. it seems to dock itself in my presense
content.summary: Another night sighting as usual :-)

content.detailedDescription: Here some more pictures that i took of ufo and didnt noticed them until its was in computer
content.summary: Hi its me again with some more ufo pictures

content.detailedDescription: The 2 pictures im sending you ....I took them 3 second apart at same location and i noticed after dopwnlaoding them in computer that you see a winged like plane but problem is that a plane cannot go backward and you can see it in the picture img_0773 and after on the img_0774 its way above the chemtrails and there is a oval shape in the clouds...Sorry for my poor english im french heheh
content.summary: Those pictures defies law of physics

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures for severals days of ufo and didnt noticed them until i downloaded them insisde computer......I got like 15 pictures of was i took ...Sending you 3 for now
content.summary: Taking pictures of clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was 9 or 10 and my sister was 13 or 14 years old we where at are babysiters house in sugarcreek ohio way down wimington pike,which is where i beleive to be a hotspot,but i will explaine that later.  all i can remember is my sister saying to are babysitter,whats that,i remember the dog was going crazy and we all stared at three discs moving in formation moving very slow i would say they wher about 120 feet in the air,i remember every one getting scared and a uncomfortable weied scary but exciting feeling,our babysitter ran outside about halfway to there barn freeking out staring up at these things.They wher coming closer and closer to there barn when the big one that was leading the two smaller ones stopped moving and hovverd right obove the barn,then i spaceficly remember a bright red lazer beam of light came out from under big one,it was the whole circumfrence of the bottom,it was a huge thick beam,i remember someone yelling to our babysitter to get in the house,it was either her husban or one of her two kids,charles or jesica,thats realy all i remember.I recently about two years ago asked my sister what she rememberd,and all she had to say was she rememberd the red beam,she dosnt talk about,never did,its like she doesnt want to or maybee doesnt care im not sure,all i know is i am very interested about ufo's since then and want to know more. mufon, if u read this i would like talk to someone about some my other expierence in the same area about two years ago,also i think it would be very interesting if you guys talked to the shumway family about the ufo's,and what they remember.My other expierence is crazy and would take me forever to type,sorry, and thank you feel free to call me at937 307 3846 take care and godbess
content.summary: There where three of them in formation the one leading was much larger

content.detailedDescription:
i saw a ufo on august 16,2008 at 9 to 930pm flying by top portion of full moon.Warm humid night.
 i was with sister on august 16 on staten island east sea shore for a fireworks show.She saw the ufo too.
it was too small a ufo to be scared of.
it was like artifical light and orange ionized trail. 
it didnt change course,traveling in straight line { east to west of moon }.
if it was meterite it wouldnt have same color light and would flicker. the artificial light was white and steady,the trail was orange ionized praticles about three time the length of craft or a bit more.
it was high in the sky
the trail has tiny orange bright dots
it wasnt damaged,it looked like proplusion,but oddly it looked like the ion trail was as large or larger then the craft { white light portion }.
it wasn't a piece of space junk or something.
space junk or meterite is very radom looking trail while entering the atmospere.
this trail was constant in size at all time,and oddly beauty looking.
area we were at was on broad walk { bench chair },near father capodanno blvd and midland ave.
content.summary: Small { distance } white artifical light with steady orange ionized trail

content.detailedDescription: i was sitting at a sunoco gas station and noticed a cloud i thought was neat and decided to take a picture of it. i didn't see anything else untill i got home and uploaded the pictures to my computer. while viewing the pictures i saw a black dot on the picture. i checked my lense to see if there was dirt on it or a spot and there wasn't. i enlarged the section where the dot was and thats when i saw the object was oval in shape. i decided to see if i could send the pictures to you to analize to determine what it is. please e-mail me if you want me to send the pictures via email. i have not printed the pictures as i do not have photo paper and ink for my printer.
content.summary: I  was  taking a picture of a cloud. i didn't see the object till i  uploaded the picture to my computer

content.detailedDescription:
I called my wife out to verify what i was seeing, she saw this:  looking at the south sky at 9:45 pm  i was looking at what i thought was a airplane flying south towards arizona but then i realized it was not moving or flying south, then it jumped as if it was zigzaging backwards and circled the spot it was in but it was mostly like a fast fly fluttering butterfly or moth was red and white lights flicking off and on then it just zipped   off with a white light trail but more  like a white after trail,  then i saw, (after my wife went into house to get bionoculars) i saw it level off again in south direction red and white pulsating back and forth(white light same color as star light)then red light out white light jumps leaving a trail then red light start flashing again but now has changed direction in north or up direction continuing on that course for roughly 40 seconds then again red light out white light jump with trailcrossing its former south courseor going down then i lost sight of it in haze or it just disappeared.But before i called for my wifes attention i saw the light for sevral minutes thinking it was nothing more than a star fluttering before it turned south with red white lights and zipped off south bound

1. looking up in the night sky.
2. i thought it was an airplane flying south bound.
3. an airplane 
4. fluttering red & white pulsating lights
5. dumb foundedcuz i wasn't sure what i was watching but i know it was not and airplane !!!
it zipped off south bound
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Refulgent red & white lights ,moving like a fluttering butterfly

content.detailedDescription:
I awoke from a sound sleep early on the morning of 28 august 2008.  for some reason, i was wide awake and could not fall back to sleep.  after tossing turning for some time, i realized i could not sleep and decided to go outside and maybe the night air would relax me, enabling me to return to sleep.  i dressed and went out to our backyard patio.  i noticed the time was 3:37 a.M.

after sitting on the patio for a few minutes, i noticed a light in the southern sky.  it appeared to be standing still so i thought it was a helicopter but i heard no sound.  then, the light moved eastward and stopped again.  still, there was no sound.  after a few seconds, the light started moving northward.  as i was observing this through trees, i walked out into the yard, where there were no trees, to see the light better.  the sky was very overcast.  as the light moved northward, toward me, i could see that it was several lights in a vee formation with the apex of the vee pointing north.

when the object was almost directly overhead, it stopped.  it was huge.  a few seconds later, the lights dropped through the overcast and i could plainly see a large "v" structure.  it had 11 lights; five on each "leg" of the vee and one at the apex.  it continued to descend and soon, a huge structure, apparently connected to the vee, broke through the clouds.  the many lights from the city illuminated the structure and i could distinctly see very symetrcial seams of the structure.  it was somewhat oval shaped with a flat edge at the rear--somewhat like a clam shell shape.  there was a protrusion out each side, near the rear of the craft.  the craft stopped descending and stood still for a few seconds.  then, a small, orbital light came out of the protrusion on the east side, passed between the vee and the larger part of the structure and appeared to re-enter the craft on the west side.  a few seconds later, another light exited the west side protrusion, crossed between the vee and the main body, and hovered there.  i had a ver distinct feeling i was being observed.  then, the light recrossed the craft and re-entered the craft via the protrusion it had started from.  the lights appeared to have other lights within them that changed colors from red to blue to a purplish to red again.

the craft remained stationary for a few more seconds, then rose back through the overcast.  a few seconds later, the craft very quickly shot northward and disappeared.

i remained standing in the yard, for i don't know how long, trying to comprehend what i had just seen.  i re-entered my house and immediatly made a sketch of the craft while everything was fresh in my mind.  i noted the time was 4:25 a.M.
content.summary: A large ufo descened from the clouds above my home.

content.detailedDescription: I saw the sighting again but it did not come down it stayed up high. i used my field glasses to watch it.  it was a bright white light till i put my field glass on then it was a multicolored light. it was ruoghly 2 degrees father east that the previous night. while i watched it in my glasses. i saw flashes of light like lightning. at 2am i went in the house because it was boring. the next night it was 1 to 2 degree farther east it was 12:15 monday morning when i saw it again another 1 degree i let my dogs out about 1am. i saw another object different from the first not quite due east from the horizon. it was doing the same thing as the one as i was watching, flying crazy in the sky. also was multicolored. the first object flew off around 2am the other object was still there when i came in at 3:30 these were 2 support crafts. they were high in the sky. i would guess they were over canada. they were not swap gas, they were not stars they were not airplanes they were not satellites, they weren't weather balloons. i have no idea of what they are. the light that i saw was like a camera flash.
content.summary: Ufo sigting

content.detailedDescription: Took the ferry to cross the delaware from penns landing to camden to go to the sea museum and i noticed something hovering over the bridge i snapped only one pic it was too fast and it just disapeared as fast it appeared,i really dont like to talk about this kind of thing because people think that is crazy and i dont want to be laugh matter.But please tell me is this a freakin ufo???
content.summary: Circular metalic like chrome

content.detailedDescription: I observed the object flying erratically when i was taking my dog off at about 5:30 am, watched it for several minutes, realized it wasnt an airplane, dashed into the house, grabbed my camera, snapped the first pic when it was about 1000feet or more in the se predawn sky, it flew just above the tree outside our porch door, after the flash from the first pic, at which time i took second pic, it vanished within seconds after the flash from my second pic, making no noise whatsoever....Also have other pix on videotape of many sphere shaped sightings in this area, taken over the past 2-3 years....Usually in the early to late night
content.summary: Object dipping & diving across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was playing outside with siblings and cousins in the front yard of our natrona heights, pa home.  it was a warm summer night with clear skies.  as a youngster i was always intrigued with ufos, aliens, and the like.  having a tendency to gaze into the nighttime skies, it was easy for me to notice the ufo as 9 year-old child.  when i first noticed the object, it looked like an enormous comet.  it was a bright orangish/white/yellow color with a tail.  however, i knew it was much too big to be a comet.  it really resembled a comet in the sense that the "head" of the fireball was at the bottom, and the "tail" was pointed "up" at about a 45 degree angle.  the strangest thing was that the ufo was not traveling "downward" towards the horizon but was traveling "up" with the tail leading the way forward!  i was so excited that i told my siblings/cousins who were outside with me, but they really didn't seem as interested as i was.  i ran frantically into the house to get my parents so they could see it and photograph it.  they were busy entertaining my relatives and really didn't believe me as i hysterically tried to convince them that there was a ufo outside.  unfortunately i clearly remember the helpless feeling and frustration that overcame me as i realized that they either did not believe me or just didn't want to be bothered.  when i returned outside the object was gone.  i have not seen a ufo since then.

i have estimated the date and time of the sighting to be either 1983/1984 summer and it was about 9:30pm.
content.summary: Orange/yellow/white fireball with tail was noticed in natrona heights, pa
Oval shaped airplane in a blink of an eye high up in the sky.
